Ghadiyal is a production-ready IntelliJ IDEA and PyCharm plugin that provides instant, precise navigation from Gherkin feature files to their step definitions. Built with advanced multi-threaded search strategies for maximum speed and accuracy.

  • Ctrl+Click Navigation - Command/Control click on any Gherkin step to jump directly to its definition

  • Multi-Threaded Search - 3 parallel search strategies for lightning-fast lookups
  • Smart Caching - First search ~1-2 seconds, subsequent searches instant
  • Visual Gutter Icons - See which steps have definitions at a glance
  • Exact Matching - Precise word-by-word validation, no false positives
  • Parameter Handling - Automatically converts <param> â†” {param}
